name: Salathai Resort

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The hotel is exactly look same like the photo that share by other traveller. Very well maintance, clean and nice. It located close everything but it is so quiet when u step in the resort. It have a very nice pool, from morning to evening. The spacious deluxe room is enough for me, very clean and nice for everything. The food is ok too. It only 3 mins to go for the beach. So not to be worry. It very near. this is located at the north part of patong beach. South part ( the pub road) will be more happening. But it just need to walk around 10 mins to reach for everything.
reviews.title: Amazing Small n Neat Hotel
Bad Experiences
reviews.text: Had some bad experiences and hope management of Salathai resort can do something about it else business is going to go down in the long run.. Below are some reasons to it:

1) Air-conditioning in the room was faulty. Despite reporting to the front desk, nothing was done and the guy who was on night duty at the front desk had a terrible attitude. Not only did he do nothing when he arrived at my room, he was giving me one kind of stupid face telling me to wait for the aircon to turn cold by itself. That's a total insult to me as if i'm operating aircon in hotel room for the first time... In fact, the aircon was already faulty on the first day of my arrival but i did not do anything as it was like working for a couple of hours and down for approx. 1hour but that night mentioned above was really terrible, almost the entire night, there was no air-conditioning. THis itself is good enough to screw up the entire stay...
reviews.title: Little paradise @ at affordable price

reviews.text: I stayed for 10 days in a Junior Suite Room, the size of the room was ok, the furniture are very old and some of it damaged (the hotel is very old and not in a good condition), the room was full of ants and I asked to be changed but the other rooms had the same problem, I was promised that the room will be sprayed but nothing happened, so I bought insect spray and sprayed the room daily. The hotel have no elevator so it is hard for older people to stay in the top floors, most of the rooms are located near the street so it is noisy and the noise from the near by bars will keep you awake tell 3 am, the staff were very friendly.
reviews.title: Old and in bad condition

likes.disliked: — The hotel is very old and not in a good condition

reviews.text: Great stay at the Salathai. Clean rooms and lovely pool. But breakfast are very minimal. You will need to order the eggs, bacon, ham or sausage on your own and servings are of average portion. Good for normal eater. e.g 1 cocktail sausage, 2 bacons n 2 eggs are served. If possible, get the deluxe room as they hav bigger bathroom with tubs and more space. Probably the superior is around 24sqm while the deluxe is at 30sqm. For triple sharing, best to get the deluxe room. Bonus for deluxe room as it's on the ground floor so no climbing on stairs n direct access to the lovely pool. Overall a lovely stay for it's convenient locations, close to the beach, lovely rooms and pool, and friendly staffs.
reviews.title: Great stay at Salathai

likes.liked: — the personal touch from the staffs

reviews.text: I spent a week in patong beach staying 4 nights at salathai and 2 nights at patong resort. Salathai resort has absolutely fantastic staff!!! Everyone was very friendly and helpfull, a real plus for the resort. The room was nice and for the price I paid, I got what I expected, not luxury but everything I needed. The bathroom was a bit overdone with the blue tiles but still practical. I did have some small ants in my room for 2 days but only a few and it didn't bother me. I had a deluxe room on the ground floor that opens onto the pool, definatly the way to go. Pool is nice. I felt there wasn't a great deal of privacy as it was a small hotel and all rooms face the middle of the complex. They do not charge to bring a girl back with you either. All up a good resort that is not top of the range but not a high price so you get what you pay for. I would definatly stay there again.
reviews.title: very good

reviews.text: Went a bit over budget in Singapore so decided to book somewhere cheaper for my stay in Phuket (the room was less than £30/night).
reviews.title: little gem

reviews.text: I stayed at Salathai for 12 nights end august/start september.The hotel is small with around 40 odd rooms.I stayed in a superior room as opposed to a deluxe,the only difference is the deluxe is on the ground floor and has a bathtub.If you get a good deal the superior room is fine.The pool at Salathai is perfect size and very picturesque,surrounded by trees.The hotel is located 10 min walk fron the action of Bangla Road,perfect, away from the madness but still close enough.The highlight of the hotel is the staff,all off them are polite,courteous,and very helpful and always with a smile.The hotel restaurant is excellent for dinner with a great selection of Thai and Western dishes.I would thoroughly recommend a stay at Salathai,i had a great stay....
reviews.title: Great Small Boutique Hotel 10 Mins from the action...

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed fourteen nights at the Salathai in July and thoroughly enjoyed our holiday. The hotel is perfectly situated, a few minutes stroll to the beach, with shops, bars and restaurants nearby. Although on a busy street, Salathai is in a lovely garden setting and is very quiet and relaxing. The pool is nice with plenty of lounges and sunshades. The restaurant, which faces the street, has a good menu and serves both Thai and international dishes. Quality and presentation are good at very reasonable prices. Breakfast was included and was quite adequate. We had a Superior room on the second floor which had a nice balcony overlooking the pool and gardens. Good water pressure and plenty of hot water, the shower was inclined to flood the bathroom but a little inginuity overcame this. The staff are an asset to the hotel, very polite, helpful and friendly. This is a well run establishment and is excellent value for money. We will definitely stay here again on our next visit to Phuket.
reviews.title: Loved the Salathai Resort
